name: MYSTEN LABS, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on Mysten's business model. Educate Members of Congress on stablecoin and cryptocurrency issues and legislation, including H.R. 3633, the CLARITY Act of 2025; H.R. 2392, the STABL

Educate policymakers on Mysten's business model. Educate Members of Congress on stablecoin and cryptocurrency issues and legislation, including H.R. 3633, the CLARITY Act of 2025; H.R. 2392, the STABL
Educate policymakers on digital assets tax issues, monitor S. 2207, a bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reform the treatment of digital assets.
